meanings.definition: Large in size, weight, or amount.
meanings.sent1: The heftiest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent2: The heftiest suitcase was difficult to lift onto the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The heftiest sandwich I've ever seen could feed a whole family!
meanings.sent4: Her heftiest decision was whether to study abroad or stay home.
meanings.sent5: The heftiest elephant in the herd led the way through the jungle.

meanings.sent2: The heftiest book in the library was the dictionary.
meanings.sent3: The heftiest task of the day was to clean the entire house.
meanings.sent4: Her heftiest dream was to travel the world and help others.
meanings.sent5: The heftiest decision of his life was to change careers and follow his passion.
